<style type="text/css">
/* ==========================================================================
   LIBRARY THEME (Version: 23.3)
   --------------------------------------------------------------------------
   * ELEMENTS
      : Actions
      : Fields
      : Thumbnails
         : FileField

   * COMPONENTS
      : Expired session

   * MODULES
      : Banner

   * PAGETYPES
      : Blocking login
   ========================================================================== */

/* ELEMENTS: Actions
   -------------------------------------------------------------------------- */

:root {
    --action--icon--remove: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--remove.svg);
    --action--icon--remove--hover: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--remove--hover.svg);
    --action--icon--add: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--add.svg);
    --action--icon--add--hover: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--add--hover.svg);
    --action--icon--delete: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--remove.svg);
    --action--icon--delete--hover: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--remove--hover.svg);
    --action--icon--edit: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--edit.svg);
    --action--icon--edit--hover: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--edit--hover.svg);
}

/* ELEMENTS: Fields
   -------------------------------------------------------------------------- */

:root {
    --fields--icon--caret--down: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--caret--down.svg);
    --fields--icon--caret--down--selected: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--caret--down--selected.svg);
    --fields--icon--caret--down--disabled: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--caret--down--disabled.svg);
    --fields--icon--caret--up: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--caret--up.svg);
    --fields--icon--caret--up--selected: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--caret--up--selected.svg);
    --fields--icon--clear: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--clear.svg);
}

/* ELEMENTS: Thumbnails: FileField
   -------------------------------------------------------------------------- */

.FileField {
    --thumbnail--background--image: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--user.svg);
}

/* COMPONENTS: Expired session
   -------------------------------------------------------------------------- */

:root {
    --session--icon--closethick: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/close.svg);
}

/* MODULES: Banner
   -------------------------------------------------------------------------- */

:root {
    --banner--background--image: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/_cms/4/image/bannerMainDesktop?version=331769);
}

/* Media query to target only mobile */
@media all and (max-width:750px) {
    :root {
        --banner--background--image: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/_cms/4/image/bannerMainMobile?version=331770);
    }

}

/* PAGETYPES: Blockin login
   -------------------------------------------------------------------------- */

:root {
    --login__body--background--image: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/login--bg--desktop.webp);
}

/* Media query to target only tablet */
@media all and (min-width:751px) and (max-width:1024px) {
    :root {
        --login__body--background--image: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/login--bg--tablet.webp);
    }

}

/* Media query to target only mobile */
@media all and (max-width:750px) {
    :root {
        --login__body--background--image: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/login--bg--mobile.jpg);
    }

}

/* OTHERS: New Images
   -------------------------------------------------------------------------- */

:root {
    --menu--arrow--down: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/arrow-down.svg);
}

:root {
    --arrow--left: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/arrow-left.svg);
}
